original: Sammāsambuddho, paccekasambuddho, ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī.
analyzed: ▁sammāsambuddh o ▁pacc eka sam buddh o ▁ubhato bhāg a vimutt o ▁paññā vimutt o ▁kāya sakk hī ▁diṭṭhi ppatt o ▁saddhā vimutt o ▁dhammā nu sār ī ▁saddh ānu sār ī
